name: Notification Banner
description: Dismissible notification banner for announcements, alerts, or important messages. Can be positioned anywhere on page.
content:
<script>
(function() {
  var type = '{{TYPE}}';
  var position = '{{POSITION}}';
  var dismissible = {{DISMISSIBLE}};
  var autoHide = {{AUTO_HIDE}};
  var autoHideDelay = {{AUTO_HIDE_DELAY}};
  
  // Inject CSS
  var style = document.createElement('style');
  style.textContent = '' +
    '.at-notification { padding: 15px 20px; margin: 10px 0; border-radius: 4px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; animation: slideIn 0.3s ease; }' +
    '.at-notification.info { background: #d1ecf1; color: #0c5460; border-left: 4px solid #0c5460; }' +
    '.at-notification.success { background: #d4edda; color: #155724; border-left: 4px solid #155724; }' +
    '.at-notification.warning { background: #fff3cd; color: #856404; border-left: 4px solid #856404; }' +
    '.at-notification.error { background: #f8d7da; color: #721c24; border-left: 4px solid #721c24; }' +
    '.at-notification-content { flex: 1; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; }' +
    '.at-notification-icon { font-size: 20px; }' +
    '.at-notification-message { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; }' +
    '.at-notification-close { background: transparent; border: none; font-size: 20px; cursor: pointer; padding: 0; width: 24px; height: 24px; opacity: 0.7; margin-left: 15px; }' +
    '.at-notification-close:hover { opacity: 1; }' +
    '.at-notification.hidden { display: none; }' +
    '@keyframes slideIn { from { transform: translateY(-20px); opacity: 0; } to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }' +
    '@keyframes slideOut { from { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } to { transform: translateY(-20px); opacity: 0; } }' +
    '@media (max-width: 768px) {' +
    '  .at-notification { padding: 12px 15px; }' +
    '  .at-notification-message { font-size: 13px; }' +
    '}';
  document.head.appendChild(style);
  
  // Icon mapping
  var icons = {
    info: 'ⓘ',
    success: '✔',
    warning: '⚠',
    error: '✖'
  };
  
  // Build notification HTML
  var notification = document.createElement('div');
  notification.className = 'at-notification ' + type;
  notification.setAttribute('role', 'alert');
  
  var content = document.createElement('div');
  content.className = 'at-notification-content';
  
  var icon = document.createElement('span');
  icon.className = 'at-notification-icon';
  icon.innerHTML = icons[type] || icons.info;
  
  var message = document.createElement('div');
  message.className = 'at-notification-message';
  message.innerHTML = '{{MESSAGE}}';
  
  content.appendChild(icon);
  content.appendChild(message);
  notification.appendChild(content);
  
  // Add close button if dismissible
  if (dismissible) {
    var closeBtn = document.createElement('button');
    closeBtn.className = 'at-notification-close';
    closeBtn.innerHTML = '×';
    closeBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Close notification');
    closeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      notification.style.animation = 'slideOut 0.3s ease';
      setTimeout(function() {
        notification.classList.add('hidden');
      }, 300);
    });
    notification.appendChild(closeBtn);
  }
  
  // Insert notification based on position
  if (position === 'top') {
    document.body.insertBefore(notification, document.body.firstChild);
  } else if (position === 'bottom') {
    document.body.appendChild(notification);
  } else {
    // position is a selector
    var target = document.querySelector(position);
    if (target) {
      target.insertBefore(notification, target.firstChild);
    } else {
      document.body.insertBefore(notification, document.body.firstChild);
    }
  }
  
  // Auto-hide if enabled
  if (autoHide) {
    setTimeout(function() {
      notification.style.animation = 'slideOut 0.3s ease';
      setTimeout(function() {
        notification.classList.add('hidden');
      }, 300);
    }, autoHideDelay);
  }
})();
</script>

variables.name: {{MESSAGE}}
variables.example: Your changes have been saved successfully!

variables.name: {{TYPE}}
variables.description: Notification type: info, success, warning, or error

variables.name: {{AUTO_HIDE_DELAY}}
variables.description: Auto-hide delay in milliseconds (if AUTO_HIDE is true)
